Articles.Content:
bob just activated his shield and a sandworm is headed towards your airstrip. shai hulud is mad and there is only one other way to get around on arrakis. 

this challenge is to build an ornithopter. an aircraft who's only means of propulsion is to flap around like a bird. you are allowed fuel only for power generation and are not allowed any engines. i will allow separatrons to get you started but you must burn them while still in contact with the ground. prizes for longest flight and highest altitude is not getting eaten by a sandworm. 

 

so far i have yet to build a working thopter so i dont really know whats possible. more science required!

Edited July 19, 2019 by Nuke
